about_the_game:
Included with the 2024 Premium Edition of Sea of Thieves, this bundle contains the Collector’s Dark Warsmith Figurehead and Sails, the Dark Warsmith Hull, Flag, Wheel, Capstan, Cannons and Cannon Flare, the Dark Warsmith Costume and the Diabolical Dog pet.

Items from the 2024 Deluxe Edition - the Shrouded Ghost Hunter Blunderbuss, Collector's Thunderous Fury Figurehead and Sails, the Ocean Crawler Cutlass, Pistol, Shovel, Hat, Jacket, Dress, Trousers, Hook and 10,000 gold - are also included.

Additional digital bonuses* include access to the Sea of Thieves Original Soundtrack – 2024 Edition, the Sea of Thieves: Athena's Fortune audiobook and The Rough Guide to Sea of Thieves eBook.

* Available to download from www.seaofthieves.com/bonuses (website login required) or via Steam.
